typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EMPNO as decimal(4,0),
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as decimal(4,0),
		HIREDATE as timestamp,
		SAL as decimal(7,2),
		COMM as decimal(7,2),
		DEPTNO as decimal(2,0)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> emptable
source(output(
		DEPTNO as decimal(2,0),
		DNAME as string,
		LOC as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> depttable
emptable, depttable join(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	joinType:'inner',
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinempdepttable
joinempdepttable sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
